channel.title: turbolego.com/L.txt – The Chat Codes Blog
channel.description: For all that is chat related.

item.title: Chat codes you can remember!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Today i started making some facebook smileys with codes that you can actually remember! Usually, the chatcodes are something long and bizarre like “[[149269741885552]]” but there’s a way to make a chatcode like “[[chatcodes]]” for small smileys! Here’s a small … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Today i started making some facebook smileys with codes that you can actually remember!

Usually, the chatcodes are something long and bizarre like “[[149269741885552]]” but there’s a way to make a chatcode like “[[chatcodes]]” for small smileys!

Here’s a small collection of some smileys with chatcodes you can remember:

Fuck you: [[midfing]]
Dislike: [[iidislyk]]
Rock sign: [[roxsign]]

Peace sign: [[ipeaceu]]

Green Grin: [[facegrin]]

chatcodes: [[chatcodes]]

This is how this works: facebook has this rule that says you can’t have a nickname for your page unless it has 25 likes or more. My page for example: http://facebook.com/chatcodes was named http://facebook.com/312080468826419 before i got 25 likes and could choose a nickname…

So, in order to make these small smileys with an easy-to-remember code, you need the following:

1. A page, just make one here: http://www.facebook.com/pages/create.php

2. A 180 x 180 pixel picture that still looks good when shrinked down to 16 x 16 pixels.

Example:

180 x 180:

16 x 16:

3. Upload the 180 x 180 pixel picture to your page, and use it as the page profile picture.

4. Get 25 likes.

5. Go to “Edit page” and then “Update info”.

6. Select a nickname/username:

Once you have found a available nickname/username, your page will be named like this: http://facebook.com/the username you selected

Now you can take your username, and put it in brackets like this: [[the username you selected]] and post it in the chat.

Have fun! :3

item.title: Make your own animated chat-pictures!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Mohamed Mahmoud is still finding new tricks, and now he has found a way to make new animated pictures that can be sent trough the “share” button to facebook chat! This is how you do it: 1. Go to http://www.facebook.com/notes.php … Continue reading →
item.content:encoded:
Mohamed Mahmoud is still finding new tricks, and now he has found a way to make new animated pictures that can be sent trough the “share” button to facebook chat!

This is how you do it:

1. Go to http://www.facebook.com/notes.php

2. Click the “Write a Note” button.

3. Type in this code, replace the “/ugh.gif” with your own animated picture, duh’:

<img src=”/ugh.gif”/>

4. Click the “Publish” button
5. Click the “share” button on your note, and choose “In a private Message”

Here’s the “ugh” note if you want to test it out: http://www.facebook.com/notes/tobias-andersen/ugh/10151018053586954

item.title: New extension… WITH ANIMATED PICTURES!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Mohamed Mahmoud made a new extension using some of the source-code from the old extension by Lé Boss, and this extension by anonymous86. This extension is the first one to have ANIMATED pictures! Get it here: userscripts.org/scripts/show/139478
item.content:encoded:
Mohamed Mahmoud made a new extension using some of the source-code from the old extension by Lé Boss, and this extension by anonymous86.

This extension is the first one to have ANIMATED pictures!

Get it here: userscripts.org/scripts/show/139478

item.title: Facebook Meme Chat Emoticons Bar v3!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Today Taher Sellami released the Facebook Meme Chat Emoticons Bar v3 (using the sourcecode from the first extension by “Le Boss“) with all new pictures that fixes those who went dead or corrupt in v2! Download here: http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/135639
item.content:encoded:
Today Taher Sellami released the Facebook Meme Chat Emoticons Bar v3 (using the sourcecode from the first extension by “Le Boss“) with all new pictures that fixes those who went dead or corrupt in v2!

Download here:

http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/135639

item.title: iPhone/iPad/iPod App!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Josh Bitossi, a young developer from Austraila has made the first ever chat-codes related app for iPhone/iPad/iPod! Get it here: http://itunes.apple.com/au/app/facebook-emoticons/id496836592?mt=8 Josh Bitossi’s webpage: http://www.facebooksmileyshq.com/view-all-smileys/ You can see how it works in this video update:
item.content:encoded:
Josh Bitossi, a young developer from Austraila has made the first ever chat-codes related app for iPhone/iPad/iPod!

Get it here:
http://itunes.apple.com/au/app/facebook-emoticons/id496836592?mt=8

Josh Bitossi’s webpage:
http://www.facebooksmileyshq.com/view-all-smileys/

You can see how it works in this video update:

item.title: New Text Generator!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: You may remember the text-generator by Lars Arne Svanes? Well, that generator is currently down, but fear not! Because the developers behind http://smileyti.me/ has made an alternative: http://smileyti.me/facebook-chat-text-generator/
item.content:encoded:
You may remember the text-generator by Lars Arne Svanes?

Well, that generator is currently down, but fear not! Because the developers behind http://smileyti.me/ has made an alternative:

http://smileyti.me/facebook-chat-text-generator/

item.title: Chat Codes Generator For Sale!
item.dc:creator: turbolego
item.description: Kirill Shulman has decided to sell the chat codes generator http://smileyti.me/ for $15,000.   If you are interested, contact him on facebook: TheShulman
item.content:encoded:
Kirill Shulman has decided to sell the chat codes generator http://smileyti.me/ for $15,000.

 

If you are interested, contact him on facebook: TheShulman

item.title: Extension update!

The extension produced by Taher Sellami (using the sourcecode from the first extension by “Le Boss“) has finally been updated!

You can get it here: userscripts.org/scripts/show/130128
